overview: Live recording of Within Temptation on the 'Main square festival' in Arras, France.  1) Mother Maiden (Short Movie)  2) Shot in the Dark  3) In the Middle of the Night  4) Faster  5) What Have You Done  6) Fire and Ice  7) Ice Queen  8) Where Is the Edge  9) Iron  10) Stand My Ground  11) Sinéad (Short Movie)  12) Sinéad  13) Mother Earth
title: Within Temptation: Main Square Festival
